prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that is agile and has a playful demeanor.
Imagine a Pokemon with a blue body and green accents, perfect for stealthy movements.
Generate a Pokemon that resembles a lizard, with a vibrant color palette and quick reflexes.
Make a creature that thrives in wetland areas, showcasing shades of blue and green.
Show me a Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings, featuring unique aquatic traits.
Give me a design of a Pokemon that is small and bipedal, with distinctive facial markings.
Design a middle evolution water-type Pokemon with features that hint at its final form.
